definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 分析家預測銀行將裁員二十萬。

sentences.english: Social analysts often overrate the rate of change .
sentences.chinese: 社會分析家往往過高估計發生變化的速度。

sentences.english: Some analysts have suggested recently that a Delta-Northwest combination may be possible.
sentences.chinese: 近期有分析家預測，達美航空可能與西南航空合併。

sentences.english: But most analysts expect the short-term impact to be muted.
sentences.chinese: 但大多數分析家認爲，短期不會有什麼反應。

sentences.english: The list has been viewed by analysts as a window on the Asia-Pacific region's economic dynamism.
sentences.chinese: 這份榜單被分析家視爲亞太經濟活力的一扇窗口。

sentences.english: Analysts also predict improvements at Morgan Stanley /quotes/comstock/13*!
sentences.chinese: 分析家還預測，摩根士丹利將有業績改善。

sentences.english: But some analysts have suggested that a guilty verdict is almost certain.
sentences.chinese: 但有分析家暗示對他們的有罪判定幾乎是毫無疑問的。

sentences.english: Analysts say this year has actually seen an increase in job posts available.
sentences.chinese: 分析家指出，今年的空職上是了。

sentences.english: To most military analysts, these redeployments make a lot of sense.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數軍事分析家看來，這些重新部署十分在理。

sentences.english: At least one political analyst finds the First Lady something of a cipher.
sentences.chinese: 很多分析家認爲第一夫人簡直就是一個難解之謎。

sentences.english: Analysts and investors did not appear overly worried.
sentences.chinese: 分析家和投資商對此似乎並不過於擔心。

sentences.english: Analysts expect the fast-food industry to grow modestly this year.
sentences.chinese: 分析家們期望快餐業今年適度增長。

sentences.english: Analysts say it's a huge strategic shift.
sentences.chinese: 分析家說，這是一重大的戰略轉移。

sentences.english: Some analysts have cautioned against underestimating Ms. Suu Kyi, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，很多分析家謹慎反對低估昂山素季女士。

sentences.english: Constance's husband is a financial analyst.
sentences.chinese: 康斯坦斯的丈夫是一名財政分析家。

sentences.english: Industry watchers have pointed out that the firm still has no way of making money.
sentences.chinese: 產業分析家指出，公司仍未發現贏利點。

definition: Brzezinski (name)/Zbigniew Brzezinski (1928-2017), Polish-American academic and politician, US National Security Adviser 1977-1981

pinyin: ji4 suan4 ji1 ke1 xue2 jia1

definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
